info.title: Smart File Organizer API
info.description:
AI-powered file management system with semantic search, chat functionality, lesson generation, slideshow video creation, and content processing.

## Features
- **File Management**: Upload, organize, and manage documents and videos with folder support
- **AI-Powered Search**: Semantic similarity search using OpenAI embeddings with title priority
- **Document Chat**: Conversational AI interface for documents with oversight agent
- **Avatar Chat**: AI personas with access to file database
- **Lesson Generation**: Multi-agent system for educational content creation
- **Slideshow Video Generation**: Create MP4 videos with AI-generated slides and OpenAI TTS narration
- **Content Generation**: AI-powered content creation from files and folders (up to 1000 files)
- **Excel Import System**: Automatic folder/file structure creation from curriculum spreadsheets
- **Automatic OCR**: Background OCR processing for scanned PDFs using Tesseract.js
- **Processing Status Monitor**: Real-time file processing status with detailed error tracking
- **Hybrid Storage**: Optimized performance with database caching + cloud storage
- **Automatic Processing**: Text extraction, video transcription, and metadata generation

## Recent Enhancements
- Slideshow video generation with OpenAI TTS narration (multiple voices)
- Excel import with automatic Google Drive file download and processing
- Folder selection for content generation (supports 137+ folders)
- File limit increased from 50 to 1000 for content generation
- Enhanced error handling (377+ error files properly tracked)
- File details modal with complete metadata viewing
- Smart search with title priority for better relevance

## Authentication
Currently uses a demo user system. For production use, implement proper authentication.

## Base URL
Production: `https://smart-file-organiser.replit.app/api`
Development: `http://localhost:5000/api`
